text:
......Oh well! I lost, I lost!
Talking big and ending up like this, serves me right!

But Fuyuko-chan, you got the highest score!
And your singing was amazing--

...Even if you're amazing, it's meaningless if you're not seen.
Effort is required to be seen...

I used to think I didn't need that kind of thing--
but that wasn't the case.

Huh...
Were you listening to the conversation? I'm--

Shut up! I don't want to hear any more, from you!
If you're the center, then you're the center!

Of course.
Do I look like the type to let things I don't like slide?
Wait a minute, wait a minute.

Am I being ignored? I've been feeling like Fuyuko-chan's
been avoiding me, not just her, I feel that way too--

Sorry...
I thought we were a good unit...

Stop it with those conclusions.
I'm not satisfied with such a messy unit.

--Actually, I've been wondering when to interrupt,
but where did Fuyuko-chan's character come from?

--Who knows? I don't know.
And... saying stuff like that is so tacky.
